reviewText: played fine on my multi blue ray player BUT at chapter 14 STOPPED playing and would NOT play last chapter 15 at all I sent back for refund  I WISH IT WOULD HAVE WORKED
For the other reviewer this is a PAL dvd. I watched the video back on April 10, 2008. I haven't smoked since. I was a pack a day smoker. Watch this or read the book.

Couldn't play it on my lap top, DVD player, tried it on a couple of other players.
Like to return/ exchange for an American version cd if you show me the way.
